|802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = vzw_xxx |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = dismissed |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/19/2018 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 400 |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141411220010J REV:0A2" is silkscreened on the board. :This matches [[Arcadyan]] conventions. Model names included in the FCC Model Names Confirmation Letter or various Test Report documents: *VZW-AC1300 ([[:Category:Verizon|Verizon]] [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin.ng/blob/master/README.TXT VRZ-AC1300]) *VZMESHROUTER (VZMESHWAR) {{WiFiCert|WFA74201|01/04/2018}} {{see also|ASUS Lyra Mini|Arcadyan}} '''Note:''' [[ASUS]] requested dismissal of the application for FCC approval with FCC filings available on 7/19/2018 saying, ''"For business reason, we have no plans to sell the device in the short term."'' and ''"We conﬁrmed this device (FCC ID: MSQ-RTACHQOO) has not been sold or marketed in the US and anywhere, i.e., in any country before. Due to this reason, we will like to dismiss this FCC ID."'' ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info • >> . |
###########################################################################
# Qualcomm Atheros little-endian ARM platform, linux-3.14.x
# SOC: IPQ401x
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
#	SPI, NAND

export VZW-AC1300 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y SSH=y QCA=y IPQ40XX=y PARENTAL2=y YANDEXDNS=y 
 VPNC=y EMAIL=y OPENVPN=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y EBTABLES=y AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="VZW-AC1300" 
 NVRAM_64K=y TUNEK="n" OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI MDNS=y FINDASUS=y 
 TEMPROOTFS=y DEBUGFS=y CFGSYNC=y USB="USB" XHCI=y NOTIFICATION_CENTER=y WLCEVENTD=y 
 REDIRECT_DNAME=y \
	UBI=y UBIFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	LP5523=y BT_CONN=y SINGLE_SSID=y \
	ATF=y QCA_TW_AUTO_BAND4=y STAINFO=y JFFS2USERICON=y HIVE_LIB=y HIVE_BIN=y \
	WIFICLONE=y QCA_VAP_LOCALMAC=y PSISTLOG=y LYRA_HIDE=y DUAL_BACKHAUL=n 
        ETHBACKHAUL=n
}} [[Category:Verizon]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
